item.description:
You are all invited to an event hosted by Inner Space Meditation Center and Gallery. Please see below for details:

Please RSVP on this meetup page, and then officially reserve your seat through this link; space is limited :

http://feelinggreat.eventbrite.com/

Special Event: Feeling Great No Matter What!

March 16~2:00 to 4:00 PM
Cambridge Public Library
449 Broadway, Cambridge, MA 02138

Hosted by :Inner Space Meditation Center and Gallery in Harvard Square  This event includes a talk with powerful insights, entertainment and an experience of meditation.

During this event you will discover:

◦ How to feel great no matter what you’re up against
◦ Transform the way you think, feel and experience life
◦ Let go of fears and find your inner strengths
◦ Understand the power of your true identity and reclaim your dignity


Speaker: Gayatri Naraine is a spiritual educator, writer and speaker. She is a dynamic speaker who shares deep insights with great clarity


Click here to Register Now: http://feelinggreat.eventbrite.com/
Or call 617-547-1110

The event is offered FREE OF CHARGE as a community service. All are welcome.
item.name: Feeling Great No Matter What!
